entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 3:56 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
